hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas commented on Allah, the Most High, saying:And We made not the vision which We showed but a trial for mankind (17:60). He said: "It is the vision he saw with his eyes, on the night the Prophet (ï·º) was taken on the journey to Bait Al-Maqdis. And the accursed tree in the Qur'an (17:60).
